titleStmt.title: A letter: whearin, part of the entertainment vntoo the Queenz Maiesty, at Killingwoorth Castl, in Warwick Sheér, in this soomerz progress 1575. iz signified: from a freend officer attendant in the coourt, vnto his freénd a citizen, and merchaunt of London
titleStmt.author: Patten, William, fl. 1548-1580.
Laneham, Robert, 16th cent, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Signed: R.L. Gent mercer, i.e. Robert Laneham; but in fact by William Patten.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
